text: Attention shifted on Thursday to a handful of states where the presidential result remained too close to call but where Joseph R. Biden Jr. seemed to have an advantage, and to the courts, where the Trump campaign had filed a barrage of lawsuits challenging the validity of the count.
snippet: After a campaign that exposed deep rifts in a nation more polarized than at any time in modern memory, each announcement of new vote totals stoked waves of emotion from the competing factions.
